price: 29. Denbiilayaashu waxay ku qosli jireen kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey ee mu'miniinta ah.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
